oai_dc:dc.dc:title: BIO-INCROP PROJECT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Manici, L.
Maestrini , C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil biology
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: BIO-INCROP web site is one deliverable n. 1 of Work package 0 ( coordination (D0.1). The home page shows nine links. Seven lead to forther pages describing the project(Partners, Work packages, meeting, publications, funding, contact), one is the link to Core Organic 2 web page, while the last one leads to a page aiming to give examples of the relationship between soil biodiversity and functionality to persons who are not specifically involved in research.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} BIO-INCROP PROJECT. Runs 2012 - 2016. Project Leader(s): Manici , dr. L.M., Consiglio Nazionale per la Ricerca e la Sperimentazione in Agricoltura .
